Class Flag

Contains several methods which allows to configure contextual flags

SetAndReset<T>(Expression<Func<T>>, T)

Sets the value of the supplied boolean member to the provided value, and reset it to its original value on the context disposal

Declaration
public static Flag<T> SetAndReset<T>(Expression<Func<T>> member, T setValue)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Linq.Expressions.Expression<System.Func<T>> member

Lambda expression which indicates the member to be set.
T setValue

The value to be set at the context creation
Returns
Type Description
Flag<T>

Flag context which sets and resets the member value
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of the member to be set and reset

SetAndUnsetIfUnset(Expression<Func<Boolean>>)

If the current value of the supplied boolean member is false, set it to true on context creation, and set it to false on the context disposal. Otherwise, keeps it unchanged;

Declaration
public static Flag<bool> SetAndUnsetIfUnset(Expression<Func<bool>> member)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Linq.Expressions.Expression<System.Func<System.Boolean>> member

Lambda expression which indicates the member to be set.
Returns
Type Description
Flag<System.Boolean>

Flag context which sets and unsets the member value
| Improve this Doc View Source

SetAndUnsetIfUnset<T>(Expression<Func<T>>, T, T)

If the current value of the supplied member is not equal to the setValue parameter value, set it to the setValue on context creation, and set it to the unsetValue parameter value on the context disposal. Otherwise, keeps it unchanged;

Declaration
public static Flag<T> SetAndUnsetIfUnset<T>(Expression<Func<T>> member, T setValue, T unsetValue = null)

    where T : IEquatable<T>
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Linq.Expressions.Expression<System.Func<T>> member

Lambda expression which indicates the member to be set.
T setValue

The value to be set at the context creation
T unsetValue

Optional. The value to be set at the context disposal
Returns
Type Description
Flag<T>

Flag context which sets and unsets the member value
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of the member to be set and reset. Must implement IEquatable<T>.
